name: GOD PEN 01
description: The painting you are seeing right now is not just a painting, but an expression of the innermost feelings of our creator which now exist on the POLYGON blockchain . As he paints his masterpiece on the heart of humanity, he has created us artist to be his brush. He is painting with time, and these are his colors. Each stroke represents a moment in time, which brought oluwanft to where he is today. Hence the name GOD PEN.
